definition: Tsaidam or Qaidam basin (Mongolian: salt marsh), depression northeast of the Plateau of Tibet, located between the Qilian Shan and the Kunlun Shan at the northern margin of the Tibetan Plateau.
firewood/lean (of meat)/thin (of a person)
surname Chai
surname Da
to attain/to reach/to amount to/to communicate/eminent
surname Mu
tree/wood/coffin/wooden/simple/numb/one of the eight categories of ancient musical instruments 八音[ba1 yin1]
basin/flower pot/unit of volume equal to 12 斗[dou3] and 8 升[sheng1], approx 128 liters/CL:個|个[ge4]
earth/ground/field/place/land/CL:片[pian4]
-ly/structural particle: used before a verb or adjective, linking it to preceding modifying adverbial adjunct

sentences.english: Sebei gas field at the Qaidam is a typical water loose sandstone gas reservoir.
sentences.chinese: 柴达木盆地的涩北气田是典型的有水疏松砂岩气藏。

sentences.english: Qaidam Basin undergoes multi-period tectonic deformation.
sentences.chinese: 柴达木盆地经历了多期构造变形。

sentences.english: Aim To analyze Tertiary period sedimentary environment of Qaidamu saline lake.
sentences.chinese: 目的分析柴达木盆地第三纪盐湖的沉积环境。

sentences.english: Widest point in between Jiuquan and the Qaidam Basin, up to 300 km.
sentences.chinese: 最宽处在酒泉与柴达木盆地之间，达300公里。

sentences.english: Changing the motion state of Tarim Basin and Qaidam Basin.
sentences.chinese: 改变了塔里木和柴达木盆地的运动状态。

sentences.english: Qarhan Salt Lake is a typical closed lake in the dry Qaidam basin.
sentences.chinese: 柴达木盆地的察尔汗盐湖是典型的干旱地区封闭湖泊。

sentences.english: Qaidam Basin as a whole, it is a desert scene.
sentences.chinese: 对于整个柴达木盆地，它是一片沙漠景象。

sentences.english: Qinghai-Tibetan Plateau, one of the dust source regions in Asia, plays an important role in long-range dust transportation.
sentences.chinese: 柴达木盆地是青藏高原粉尘源区的重要组成之一。

sentences.english: Widest point in Jiuquan City and between the Qaidam Basin, 300 km.
sentences.chinese: 最宽处在酒泉市与柴达木盆地之间，达300千米。
